resources.string: create table task(_id integer primary key autoincrement,name varchar(50),description varchar(250),edittime datetime,begintime datetime,ttype integer,percent integer,ttime datetime,torder integer,tpic varchar(250),isring integer,overtime datetime,sync integer); create table work(_id integer primary key autoincrement,tid integer,wtime datetime,wnote varchar(250),wpoint integer,wtype integer);
select * from task order by torder desc, _id desc
